alert.note: Alert for Dauphin; Lancaster; Lebanon; York (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued September 08 at 9:15PM EDT until September 08 at 10:00PM EDT by NWS State College
info.description: The National Weather Service in State College PA has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Dauphin County in south central Pennsylvania... Northwestern Lancaster County in south central Pennsylvania... Southwestern Lebanon County in south central Pennsylvania... Central York County in south central Pennsylvania... * Until 1000 PM EDT. * At 915 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Elizabethtown, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Lebanon, Hershey, Elizabethtown, Mount Joy, Palmyra, Annville, Cornwall, Maytown, Campbelltown, Hallam, Pleasant Hill and Marietta. This includes The Pennsylvania Turnpike from mile markers 253 to 269. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: Stay inside a well built structure and keep away from windows.
